column5: Well, with the warm temps today and the forecast for continued warm weather, it occured to me that Spring must be here and in following that, we usually see the re-emergence of one Johnny Bass! His winter hybernation should be complete and his reprots should start to come in. Anyone know what's up with Johnny B? His spring arrival is like a ritual! HH
I think he saw his shadow...
lol Wayne.  That's a good one.
Thanks for that Wayne!    Any idea on how to get coffee to stop pouring out my nose!!!! HH
I think he,s still looking for shirt. Waiting for him is like waiting the the first period intermision for Don Cherry.LOL
Soon enough he'll drop in. He's out of season right now anyway.... Another month or so he'll be in here shooting the breeze... Especially with all the election talk for June
